elements.name: section_header_teaching_with_ai
elements.html: Using Artificial Intelligence to Teach and Learn Computer Science

elements.name: section_teaching_with_ai
elements.html: The following are questions about your experience and interests in using Artificial Intelligence (AI) to support you while teaching Computer Science. Your responses will inform our priorities around tool development.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_ta_likelihood
elements.title: How likely are you to use an AI-assisted tool to assess and evaluate students' computer science projects?
elements.description: Such a tool uses AI to check students' work against a rubric, assessing progress toward learning outcomes and standards.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_ta_reasons
elements.title: Please share the reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted tool to assess and evaluate students' computer science projects. Understanding your answer will help us find how to improve the tool and supports.

choices.text: I would like to understand how the tool works before using it
I don't trust AI enough to use it for essential components of teaching
I am not confident that an AI tool will assess student work as well as I can
My school restricts access to AI tools
Other

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_ta_reasons_other_comment
elements.title: Please share what are some other reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted tool to assess and evaluate students' computer science projects.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_pl_tutor_teaching_cs
elements.title: How likely are you to use an AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool to support and guide your professional development and ultimately enhance your computer science teaching practices?
elements.description: This AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool would support your professional development by offering customized guidance for lesson planning, differentiation, and suggesting activities and assessments relevant to the computer science concepts you are teaching.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_pl_tutor_teaching_cs_reasons
elements.title: Please share the reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool to enhance your computer science teaching practices.

choices.text: I would like to understand how the tool works before using it
I don't trust AI enough to use it for essential components of teaching
I am not confident that an AI tool will do my work as well as I can
My school restricts access to AI tools
Other

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_pl_tutor_teaching_cs_reasons_other_comment
elements.title: Please share what are some other reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool to enhance your computer science teaching practices.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_pl_tutor_learn_cs
elements.title: How likely are you to use an AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool to guide and support your learning of computer science while you teach?
elements.description: This would be an AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool to enhance your learning and understanding of the computer science concepts you are teaching.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_pl_tutor_learn_cs_reasons
elements.title: Please share the reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool to support your computer science learning.

choices.text: I would like to understand how the tool works before using it
I don't trust AI enough to use it for learning
I prefer to learn in other ways
My school restricts access to AI tools
Other

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_pl_tutor_learn_cs_reasons_other_comment
elements.title: Please share what are some other reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted professional learning coaching tool to enhance your learning and understanding of the computer science concepts you are teaching.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_cs_tutor_students
elements.title: How likely are you to enable your students to use an AI-assisted tool to support their computer science learning, such as an AI tutor?
elements.description: This would be an AI-powered tool for students that can deliver content and guidance, personalized hints, feedback, and encouragement on CS concepts as students work through their projects.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_cs_tutor_students_reasons
elements.title: Please share the reasons why you wouldn't enable your students to use an AI-assisted tool to support their computer science learning, such as an AI tutor.

choices.text: I would like to understand how the tool works before using it
I don't trust that an AI tool can support my students reliably and accurately
My students won't learn as much if they over-rely on AI tools
I want to prevent cheating and academic integrity violations caused by AI misuse
My school restricts access to AI tools
Other

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_cs_tutor_students_reasons_other_comment
elements.title: Please share what are some other reasons why you wouldn't enable your students to use an AI-assisted tool to support their computer science learning, such as an AI tutor.
